(It's night where I am)

::Magmatron/Jynx/Cerberus/Destron Base::

    The =
final whir of life came to the Destron base. Magmatron went into his new co=
mmand room. He sat down and began to fill the computer with information. So=
on it became self aware. It started to learn.
    Cerberus was walking thro=
ugh the corridors, looking around, so many rooms were locked to him. It jus=
t wasn't fair. He went to the only quaters that would open for him and went=
 to bed.
    Jynx hovered above the base waiting for any bots, he had his s=
earch light on.
